name: Business Massacre
description:
As an intern, you are experiencing the evils of a business. You want to break the system, but how? By killing your superiors, of course!

Core mechanics:

  • Pick up and throw
  • One shot at a time
  • Fast enemies
  • Quick level reloading

Features:

  • 7 Handcrafted levels
  • Glory kill at the end
  • Time tracking features for speedrunning
  • An absolute banger playing in the background

Made By:

  • Reinard Baertsoen
  • LongLazyLlama
  • Jennavanw
  • superffllo

This awesome game is the result of four creative students who teamed up in the first sprint of 2 Games a Month (2GAM)  2023.

2 Games a Month is a yearly indie development program for aspiring entrepreneurs. It’s a dynamic meeting ground for complementary profiles in which the focus is developing cool games with market potential.
